scripts.build:js: cd js && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.build:genkit-tools: cd genkit-tools && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.pack:all: rm -r dist || true && mkdir dist && pnpm run pack:tools && pnpm run pack:js && pnpm dist:zip
scripts.test:js: cd js && pnpm i && pnpm test:all
scripts.test:genkit-tools-cli: cd genkit-tools/cli && pnpm i && pnpm test
scripts.test:genkit-tools-common: cd genkit-tools/common && pnpm i && pnpm test
scripts.test:e2e-local: pnpm build && pnpm pack:all && cd tests && pnpm install && pnpm test
scripts.test:e2e: cd tests && pnpm install && pnpm test
